data.eml:eml: Squamatinia algharbica gen. n. sp. n., a remarkable new Coletiniinae silverfish (Zygentoma: Nicoletiidae) from caves in southern Portugal

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reboleira, Ana Sofia P. S., Gonçalves, Fernando, Oromí, Pedro, Mendes, Luis F. (2012): Squamatinia algharbica gen. n. sp. n., a remarkable new Coletiniinae silverfish (Zygentoma: Nicoletiidae) from caves in southern Portugal. Zootaxa 3260: 33-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209789
